1310000.name: Masters of Puzzle - Trip
1310000.description:
Trip is the fourth wonderful illustration from the German artist, Christian Hecker, in the collection Terran Utopia. We hope you will enjoy the new and fresh art of Christian as well as the enchanting vision of his illustrations.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, 2000, and 2500 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original illustration in HD. All the details are exactly as the artist envisioned and created them. This is an interesting puzzle because it contains both unique areas but also several mirrored details that will provide an interesting challenge. It will be of a moderate to high difficulty based on the number of puzzle tiles you choose.

If you like the art, make sure to check the other puzzle boxes in the collection Terran Utopia. You won't be disappointed.
1310000.supported_languages: 英语, 保加利亚语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
